task: Input: processed MERFISH AnnData (mouse brain). Using expression-only data from the processed MERFISH mouse brain AnnData, perform one-vs-all t-test differential expression per cluster (logFC > 0, adj p ≤ 0.05), rank genes by logFC then −log₁₀(p_adj), use feature_name for gene symbols, convert to uppercase gene symbols (deduplicate, remove Ensembl IDs), identify clusters expressing astrocyte markers, and return the combined astrocyte marker genes from the top genes of those astrocyte clusters. Return a JSON object with fields: cell_types_predicted (list of the top 13 marker gene symbols)

scoring.description: Pass if Jaccard ≥ 0.50 (≥80% overlap with 8 GT markers using top-13).
